title: Bug 17825 - ControlExampleText beeps when SWT.MULTI is selected
description: When choosing SWT.MULTI in the ControlExampleText, a beeping sound is heard. This behavior is unexpected and does not appear to be intended.
OB: After selecting SWT.MULTI, clicking on other buttons in the ControlExampleText also produces the beeping sound.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Launch the SWT Example application (Build F1 - 20020521) on Windows 2000.
2. Navigate to the ControlExample.
3. Select the Text tab.
4. Click on the button for Styles -> SWT.SINGLE.
5. Click again on the button for Styles -> SWT.MULTI.
6. Observe that a beeping sound is heard when selecting SWT.MULTI.
